UniprotID	Q14254
Accession	Q14254
EntryName	FLOT2_HUMAN
ProteinName	Flotillin-2 (Epidermal surface antigen) (ESA) (Membrane component chromosome 17 surface marker 1)
GeneName	FLOT2 ESA1 M17S1
Length	428
Function	May act as a scaffolding protein within caveolar membranes, functionally participating in formation of caveolae or caveolae-like vesicles. May be involved in epidermal cell adhesion and epidermal structure and function.
Subcellular Location	Cell membrane; Membrane; Caveola; Endosome; Membrane
